section.title: Overview
section.lines: This page provides information on the Notification Bar within the OpenStack Queuing Solution Tool (OQS).

section.title: Purpose of this Feature
section.lines: This feature notifies the user of any ongoing issues within the tool. Such issues may include:

ul.li: Pending bug fix: If a bug exists in the tool, this Notification Bar will inform the user.
Third-party Software issues: If a third-party piece of software is undergoing maintenance, has a bug or is offline, the Notification Bar will inform the user.

ol.li: Notifications are created on the Upgrade Tool.
On the Upgrade Tool, click on tools.
(Optional) Enter the JIRA Issue in Notification JIRA Issue field.
Click the Notification Enabled checkbox. NOTE: This will be automatically clicked (enabled) if the JIRA Issue is valid and not does have Closed status.
Click the Save button. The notification will now show on the OpenStack Queuing Solution

ul.li: Only Stratus team members have permissions to add and remove notifications.
Once the issue has been resolved the notification can be removed by unclicking Notification Enabled checkbox or the check for the closed JIRA Issue will do this, from the Upgrade Tool.
